title: House in Negombo 02
details:
Prime Group offers you this magnificent 14 unit elegant, the most affordable housing project within the well-developed city of Negombo, a best way of living and a highly appreciating investment opportunity.
Prime Palazzo, new modern masterpiece with unparalleled level of space comfort and luxury. Surrounded with shady trees and lush grassy lawns, these refined houses are conveniently located away from the hustle and bustle of the city.
